participant_1.background:
I am close to my family.
My favorite websites are about 80's music and biographies of authors.
i have 3 brothers.
I like to read fiction to escape from the criticism of my family.
I love the feeling of being free to speak my mind, even if it is not always appropriate.

participant_2.background:
I'm going to have a nice lazy weekend with Toto.
I'm going to miss the sun and the beach, but I'm ready to focus on my studies.
my mom teaches kindergarten and my dad is a tax assessor.
i play guitar in the local band.
i am an artist.

content.text: Hi, I'm looking for someone to talk to about my favorite book. Do you like to read?
Hi there! I love to read! I just finished a really good book, and I'm looking for something new to read. What's your favorite book?
I'm really into 80's music, so my favorite book is "The Catcher in the Rye."
I've heard good things about that book, but I've never read it. What's it about?
It's about a teenage boy who's struggling with his family and his place in the world. It's a really good read, and I highly recommend it.
It sounds interesting! I'll have to check it out. What are some of your other favorite books?
I also like "To Kill a Mockingbird" and "One Hundred Years of Solitude."
Those are both great books! I love "To Kill a Mockingbird."
Me too! It's such a classic.
What kind of music do you like?
I love 80's music, especially the new wave and synthpop bands.
Cool! I love 80's music too! I'm a big fan of Duran Duran and Culture Club.
Me too! I love Duran Duran. They're my favorite band.
They're so good! I love their music videos.
I'm glad we have something in common!
